title: The Brain That Wouldn't Die - extended version (1962)

sources.title: TheBrainThatWouldntDie ExtendedVersion1962
sources.description: I'm calling this the "extended version" because whether it's "uncut" or not is anybody's guess. The "neck rip" scene is intact. However, please note the picture quality is a bit washed out in some places but still watchable in my opinion.
